alert.note: Alert for Coastal Citrus; Coastal Hernando; Coastal Hillsborough; Coastal Pasco; Inland Citrus; Inland Hernando; Inland Hillsborough; Inland Pasco; Sumter (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 5:36PM EDT by NWS Tampa Bay
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Citrus, northwestern Sumter, central Pasco, Hernando and north central Hillsborough Counties through 615 PM EDT... At 535 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 9 miles northeast of Beverly Hills to 6 miles west of Land O Lakes. Movement was north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Tampa, Spring Hill, New Port Richey, Brooksville, Inverness, Homosassa Springs, Hudson, Lutz, Beverly Hills, Weeki Wachee, New Port Richey East, Inverness Airport, South Brooksville, Black Diamond, North Brooksville, Land O Lakes, Greater Carrollwood, Hernando County Airport, Timber Pines and Hill n Dale. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
